Thx Hive

CM8 Doing It Right The First Time

Sources:

Video: Latino HDCAM unmarked
Audio: UnKnOwN, thx my friend, perfect audio

Notes:

HOT and Brandnew movie, go get it!!!
Latino Video was very good, scr quality, no movements, no focus issues, bright and sharp, as good as it gets
Couldnt get line for this but UnKnOwN was so nice to let me have his mic so that i can make a perfect release
could be passed as line but it isnt, doesnt matter cause this mic is so good we dont need line anyways

Encode:

daylight scenes were already bright enough, darker scenes and night scenes were good too, still decided to cut movie in pieces
to get out the perfect vid and raised brightness contrast as needed, and added slightly sharpness
all is in perfect shape

audio as usual is lipsynced to my video

will do me till retail
enjoy

Video: 720x294 @bitrate 1800 2pass
Audio: Sweet HQMic Stereo 2.0
Sample: yes included

PS:
to already answer the first comment that would come out for sure:
"is the video complete", 40secs are missing at runtime 5min-something, the rest is all there, you will survive that
